response.overview: Ugo Zatterin (15 October 1920 – 17 July 2000) was an Italian journalist. In 1957 he began working for Rai Teche as a political commentator. However, the investigations he carried out for Rai such as “La donna che lavora”, “Salute under investigation”, “L'industria dei calciatori”, “Viaggio nell'Italia che cambia”, are of historical value today because they photograph the critical issues and social developments of Italy in the 60s, at the dawn of the economic boom. By 1959, his video investigations had developed over eight episodes. “La donna che lavoro” is dedicated to the labourers of the south.
response.title: A woman who works

titles.title: La donna che lavora - Le braccianti del Sud
A woman who works - The labourers of the South
